title: fishy00001
author: fishy00001
created_time: February 08, 2023, 05:09:07 PMLast edit: February 08, 2023, 06:02:49 PM by fishy00001
content: UFC fights Volk vs Islam makachev go down.  on 11 Febuary. My prediction is that Islam is going to win because the wresting and the grappling-Volk is terrified when he near islam you could see on his eyes.He was never as fearful before.I am confident about my prediction that I give you  money back guarantee  up to 5$ if I wrong.Stay for more updated launching soon my UFC prediction blog.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: fishy00001 on February 08, 2023, 05:09:07 PMI am confident about my prediction that I give you  money back guarantee  up to 5$ if I wrong.Put the money on an escrow or else this not true. You made promise before on one of your thread that you will give money to a certain user once your prediction is right yet I don’t see really give what you promised.However you don’t have responsibility to this kind of refund but knowing your history of posting will surely no one will gonna take your offer seriously. I’m making a bet for this match and we have same pick. I’m not expecting for any refund because I’m confident that Islam will gonna win. Good luck on this offer if our bet lose.

comments.body: not related to the topic but what happened to your other accountRiocasino? as far as I can see it is not banned or anything, did you forget your password? also, you were wrong about your last prediction.Quote from: fishy00001 on February 08, 2023, 05:44:05 PMI never said that I give money to someone  before and not completed. comments.body: Quote from: fishy00001 on February 08, 2023, 05:09:07 PMI am confident about my prediction that I give you  money back guarantee  up to 5$ if I wrong.People should know that this one is already a red flag. You shouldn't give any guaranteed results if I were you starting in this business, it will not get you any further. Show in here the proof that you really have made some winnings out of your predictions and maybe people will believe you instead.

comments.body: Quote from: fishy00001 on February 08, 2023, 05:09:07 PMUFC fights Volk vs Islam makachev go down.  on 11 Febuary. My prediction is that Islam is going to win because the wresting and the grappling-Volk is terrified when he near islam you could see on his eyes.He was never as fearful before.I am confident about my prediction that I give you  money back guarantee  up to 5$ if I wrong.Stay for more updated launching soon my UFC prediction blog. I also have Makachev winning his grappling is very good and he can take down Volkanowski anytime with his size and take-down ability Islam just needs to avoid engaging or trading punches Volks has power in both hands, Islam is a complete fighter in wrestling but I see Volks offering resistance in this fight I have seen him getting out on choke na that was a perfectly placed choke, even if you don't offer that $5 chargeback Islam is going to win based on their ability and past performances.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Nothing new mate, we are all sure about Islam winning this weekend, and that's why it only pays x1.26, such low multiplier means the odds are highly on his side, it will be really hard or almost impossible to see Alexander winning this one. So, maybe small but easy money on Islam on this one, let's see how it goes.And I would like to know your prediction in the Yair fight, I think a big factor in that one Is high, I mean 5'11'' vs 5'6'' is a huge difference.

So, maybe small but easy money on Islam on this one, let's see how it goes.And I would like to know your prediction in the Yair fight, I think a big factor in that one Is high, I mean 5'11'' vs 5'6'' is a huge difference.I only watch fighter I like.  So I can't give you a prediction for unknown fighters that i don't follow, like yair. ]Derris Lewis vs. Sergey  predicted a couple of days ago that lewis would win. The next fights I can predict are only:Jon jones vs. gane  - Jones will win.   due to better wrestling and mindset. (If negannu takes him down, Jon can also) And  Gane ko rate is only 45%.  It is not like negannu 87% that he can only punch him, and he goes down. Jon will likely last rounds with him, take him down, and win by decision.Usman vs. - Edwards. Usman is a considerable favorite. But I believe Edwards will win because Usman starts to talk about depression and shit that waken his mind as a man.In an interview with Joe Rogan. I need to see how he speaks soon. This kind of KO is traumatic; many fighters never recover from it.  It will depend on how he trains his mind for the fight more than how he traims in the gym.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Good luck with the predictions but there is no need to give money back if someone follows you. What is your ultimate goal, become a paid tipper? Therefore, you will need to build a group of people that follows your bets and you will need to have a good ROI before people will follow you.

comments.body: Noone really cares about your predictions or guarantees. You are definitely not a trustworthy person. If you were you wouldn't be ban evading currently. Being banned doesn't mean break forum rules and make a new account, it means go away and stay away.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: fishy00001 on February 09, 2023, 02:56:09 AMAddressing the ban evasion, When I registered today, I paid 10$ for the register account fee for bitcoin talk. bitcointalk got my IP.I got banned before. When I pay again, the ban is canceled.You've misunderstood what you paid for (whether by mistake or willingly, it doesn't matter here).You've paid for lifting a restriction on an IP, not for lifting a ban against you, as person.This means that the IP is free to use, but you are still banned.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: fishy00001 on February 09, 2023, 02:45:48 AM<cut>Bitcoin allow you to open you new account after getting banned if you pay 10$ fees which i PAID. No, it doesn't. If you've been banned, starting a new account isn't allowed, unless it's for the purpose of appealing your ban in the Meta section. And the "evil point fees" you're talking about are just for your IP address - because it was linked to a user that got banned permanently. Basically, you can pay to have your IP address cleared, but the ban on your user account still stands.Check out rule number 25 in the Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on February 09, 2023, 10:56:55 PMIf you've been banned, starting a new account isn't allowed, unless it's for the purpose of appealing your ban in the Meta section.It is the rule of the forum. But if anyone creates an account after being banned from the account still can create an account and until someone reports it is ban evasion and/or the admin/moderator/system can not detect the ban evasion there will have no problem using the account. But if anyone shows proof of the ban evasion then the admin/moderator can ban the newly created account.
